regions.name: Hearthlands
regions.description: A temperate heartland of trade routes and quiet farms, stitched together by hedgerows and low stone walls.

locations.name: Crossing
locations.description: A bustling crossroads where travelers converge and caravans trade time for rumor.

places.name: Market Square
places.description: Stalls and barrows packed with goods from every road, the cobbles always wet from the fountain.

random_events.text: A caravan overturns, scattering goods and drawing a sudden crowd.
A traveling musician strikes up a lively tune that lifts the whole square.
The town crier announces a missing heirloom and offers a modest reward.

places.name: Wayfarer Inn
places.description: A warm hall with a steady fire and a keeper who knows every face.

random_events.text: A soaked messenger bursts in with a sealed letter for someone unknown.
A table of traders erupts into a laughing argument over the best road to the coast.

places.name: Guildhall Steps
places.description: Broad steps where clerks post contracts and petitioners gather before the bell.

random_events.text: A new charter is nailed to the board, drawing a surge of eager onlookers.

locations.name: Greenfold
locations.description: A ribbon of farms and orchards that feed the Crossing and keep its granaries full.

places.name: Orchard Row
places.description: Long lines of fruit trees and the soft hum of bees in wicker hives.

random_events.text: A sudden gust knocks loose a shower of apples that rolls across the path.

places.name: Miller's Bridge
places.description: A covered bridge beside a turning wheel and a steady, grain-scented mist.

random_events.text: The miller offers a quiet warning about strange tracks along the riverbank.

regions.name: Wyrdwood
regions.description: A deep, shadowed forest where old paths twist and the air smells of rain and pine.

locations.name: Mistgrove
locations.description: A mossy hollow where the canopy dims the day and whispers carry far.

places.name: Stone Circle
places.description: Ancient standing stones etched with runes worn smooth by weather.

random_events.text: A faint blue glow creeps along the runes before fading back into the stone.

places.name: Foxglove Hollow
places.description: A sheltered nook with bright flowers and a narrow, winding trail.

random_events.text: A startled deer bolts through the brush, startling birds into flight.

locations.name: Warden's Line
locations.description: A watchtrail of leaning posts and old markers that once kept the forest tame.

places.name: Old Watchtower
places.description: A crumbling tower with a clear view over the treetops and the valley beyond.

random_events.text: A flare of distant light flickers on the horizon and then vanishes.
